ModMetData.name: Trump Cancer Wind Turbines
ModMetData.author: abias1122
ModMetData.description:
What if Trump was right and wind turbines caused cancer? With this mod, you can step into Trump's reality where wind turbines are noisy cancer machines.
Affects on game: - Wind turbines now make Trump sounds - Wind turbines have a chance of causing pawns too close to it to develop carcinoma
